title: Jussie Smollett Trial Nears End as Attorneys Prepare for Closing Arguments
sub_head: Case has focused on dueling testimonies between former ‘Empire’ actor and two brothers he allegedly paid to attack him
body:
CHICAGO—Lawyers are set to begin their closing arguments in Jussie Smollett’s criminal trial Wednesday in a case that has largely hinged on contradictory testimony from the former “Empire” actor and the two men who said he paid them to fake a hate crime against him.
Mr. Smollett, who is openly gay, told police that he had been attacked by two men who used racist and antigay slurs, hit and kicked him and placed a noose around his neck at around 2 a.m. on Jan. 29, 2019, as he walked home from picking up food at a Subway sandwich shop.
